meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vast.
meanings.sent1: The vastnesses of the ocean amazed the children on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The desert's vastnesses stretched out before us, endless and empty.
meanings.sent3: The vastnesses of the playground seemed to grow bigger as the children played tag.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a universe of vastnesses, full of unexplored thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The vastnesses of space made him feel small and insignificant in the grand scheme of things.

meanings.sent1: The vastnesses of the forest were home to many different animals.
meanings.sent2: We marveled at the vastnesses of the canyon, its walls towering above us.
meanings.sent3: The vastnesses of the library overwhelmed the new student trying to find a book.
meanings.sent4: The vastnesses of the sky at night were filled with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The vastnesses of the field seemed to go on forever, disappearing into the horizon.
